p: Expressed lemon oil contains perillaldehyde (0.023%, detected in one batch), a substance for which EFSA identified a concern for genotoxicity (EFSA CEF Panel, 2015c), which was confirmed by the Joint FAO/WHO Expert Committee on Food Additives (JECFA) (WHO, 2018). No information is available on the carcinogenicity of perillaldehyde.
